entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
